mapper.select: select compname,quotestatus, reqquote, no from (select s.compname, q.quotestatus, q.reqquote, q.no, row_number() over(order by q.reqquote desc) as rnum from quotation q, startup s where s.id = q.compid and q.manuid = #{manuId}) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pagevo.start} AND #{pagevo.end} ORDER BY reqquote DESC
